shutdown

public void shutdown()
              throws java.io.IOException
Shutdown the repository. After this call return, the find methods cannot be used until initialize() is called again.

newModule

public Module newModule(ModulesRegistry registry,
                        ModuleDefinition def)
Description copied from interface: Repository
Creates a module instance from a Module definition. Different implementation of repositories may need to use different means of initializing a Module instance depending on the module's definition nature. For instance, an Netbeans module or a JSR277/Glassfish module could use different implementation of Module.

Specified by:
newModule in interface Repository
Parameters:
registry - is the registry that will own the module
def - the requested module definition
Returns:
the uninitialized Module instance
